content: kkuurrrraajjoonngg hhaannddccrraaffttss ~~~~~~~~~~ monika this is the companion to the one-der in a two skein version it starts with the same central mesh but having the edging continue all the way around gives it more body and length choose one colour that you love or two skeins in complementary colours one for the mesh and one for the edging requirements two skeins koigu kppm fingering weight yarn 50g/175yds 3 5mm crochet hook abbreviations english terms used chain chain space space treble_crochet treble double_crochet double_crochet dtr treble_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch pattern mesh make 32 chain row 1 1tr into 7th chain from hook *chain 2 skip 2 chain 1tr into next chain* repeat from * to * 7 more times nine spaces row 2 make 5 chain turning chain *1tr into next chain space chain 2* repeat from * to * seven times 1 treble_crochet into top of turning chain repeat row 2 until you run out of the first skein of yarn edging begin at corner where mesh finished round 1 make 4 chain 1 double_crochet into corner square *4ch 1dc into next square along side of mesh * repeat from * to * until last square before next corner 4ch 1dc into corner square 3 times continue for each of two long sides and two ends of the scarf until last corner 1dcr into last corner square 4ch slip_stitch into 1st chain of round round 2 *1ch 1tr 1ch 1dtr 1ch 1dtr 1ch 1dtr 1ch 1tr into next 4ch space 1ch 1 double_crochet into next 4ch space * repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into 1st chain darn in ends and block this pattern is copyright © 2007 to diane mulholland www kurrajonghandcrafts com
